text: Alhamdullilah. It is a nice & well-maintained mosque within the Macpherson residential area. Prayer hall can accommodate 50 congregants per level in accordance to SafeEntry regulations. Parking is a little difficult so for drivers, please search for parking at ‚Äú8 Tanner Road, HYFA‚Äù and it is a 4-minute walk from there.

Very friendly volunteers/staffs managing the mosque, signages are clear and well-maintained facilities and toilets. Ventilation needs to be improved as it was quite hot and stuffy despite the fans (the max speed was quite slow). I strongly suggest switching on the air-conditioning during Friday prayers to enhance the comfort level.

I was fortunate to attend the jumma (Friday) prayers.
Very beautiful and peaceful mosque.
we family from kuala lumpur malaysia üá≤üáæ deeply appreciate community here. clean & strategically located mosque. alhamdulillah

Cozy masjid. Very pleasant experience performing my ibadah here for Allah.
Carpark also spacious for parking (careful of LTA officers! They come at zuhur time to summon fines!)
